title: Prohibit inline control structures
description: The body of each control structure must be enclosed by braces

title:
Enforce '
' in line ending
description: Lines must end with

title: Prohibit long lines
description: Lines must have at most 120 characters

title: Function call formatting
description: Code formatting rules for function calls

title: Prohibit multiple statements
description: Each line must have only one statement

title: Enforce uppercase in constants
description: Class constants must be named in all upper case with underscore separators

title: Enforce lowercase in PHP's constants
description: TRUE, FALSE and NULL must be lowercase

title: Enforce lowercase in keywords
description: PHP keywords must be in lower case

title: Enforce space indentation
description: Code must use an indentation of 4 spaces without tabs

title: Default arguments position
description: Method arguments with default values must go at the end of the argument list

title: Enforce single class in file
description: Each class must be declared in a different file

title: Enforce namespace in class
description: Each class must be in a namespace of at least one level

title: Enforce StudlyCaps in class
description: Classes should be named in StudlyCaps

title: Control structure formatting
description: Enforce consistent formatting of the control structures

title: Enforce lowercase in function keywords
description: Function keywords (function, public, private, etc.) must be named in lowercase

title: Enforce argument spacing
description: Function arguments must be correctly spaced

title: Enforce method visibility
description: Visibility must be declared in all methods

title: Prohibit trailing white space
description: Prohibit trailing white spaces at the end of non blank lines

title: Enforce single white space
description: There must be a single space after keywords

title: Prohibit closing tag
description: The closing tag ?> must be omitted from files containing only PHP
